![](images/db-logos/odbc.png) | [odbc](https://github.com/rstats-db/odbc) - The goal of the odbc package is to provide a DBI-compliant interface to Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) drivers. This gives a efficient, easy to setup connection to any database with ODBC drivers available, including **SQL Server**, **Oracle**, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite and others. The implementation builds on the nanodbc C++ library.
